memories: Alice: Hi Bob, it's lovely to meet you! How's your day going so far? -> What brings you here today, Alice? I'm doing well, thanks for asking.

Alice: It's lovely to meet you, Bob! I'm doing great, thanks for sharing how you're doing. What's been the highlight of your day so far? -> What have you been up to today that's made it great for you so far?
name: Bob
